source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Overcome Writer's Block & Write With Confidence

visible_instructors.title: Dave Fox
visible_instructors.job_title: Travel Author / Writing and Personal Development Coach
visible_instructors.name: Dave

items.headline: The Psychology of Writing Confidently, Writing Successfully, Writing Happily, and Overcoming Perfectionism
objectives_summary: Overcome writer's block.
Understand the difference between writing well versus falling into an abyss of perfectionism.
Write with greater confidence.

items.title: Innovation 1.0: Learn To Think Creatively Like Walt Disney

visible_instructors.title: Srinidhi Ranganathan
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Marketing Legend: King of AI - 7,00,000+ Students
visible_instructors.name: Srinidhi

items.headline: MBA in Artificial Intelligence Digital Marketing: Term 3.14 course that focusses on Walt Disney Creative Thinking Skills
objectives_summary: Understand Disney's thinking process that is simply out-of-the-box
Apply Disney's Creative & Critical Skills to any situation or any line of business
Understand the typical character development process of an author

items.title: The Business of Screenwriting MasterClass
items.headline: Learn the inside secrets about creating a career as a working screenwriter in Hollywood. Filmmaking!
objectives_summary: Expertly navigate the intricate business maze of the entertainment industry.

Securing an agent, manager, entertainment lawyer, successfully choosing a marketable idea that is still in harmony with your value system, source material, obtaining rights from a novel, reading a room, understanding energy, pacing, voice cadence, belief in your idea, higher ideals, your lifetime achievement speech to serve as a your compass for value-based choices to fuel a successful career as a professional screenwriter.

items.title: How To Start Doing Stand Up Comedy

visible_instructors.title: Brendon Lemon
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Stand-up comedian and Sales Dev Director
visible_instructors.name: Brendon

items.headline: Write, rehearse, and perform five minutes of stand-up comedy and learn a ton about yourself in the process!
objectives_summary: How to write, rehearse, and perform five minutes of stand-up comedy at a local open mic.

items.title: Voice Over Training from a voice America recognizes

visible_instructors.title: Mike Elmore
visible_instructors.job_title: Voice Actor, Audio producer, Voice Over coach
visible_instructors.name: Mike

items.headline: Learn from a National level voice talent and coach about this work from home industry that has a lot of people excited
objectives_summary: Make an educated decision as to whether or not the "Wonderful World of Voice Over" is something they want to pursue

items.title: Chess for Beginners - Learn Chess Strategy From Scratch
items.headline: Learn Must-know Chess Tactics Throughout Chess Openings, Middlegame, and Endgame
objectives_summary: You will learn all the fundamentals of chess
You will learn how to play chess like a pro
You will learn strategy, game theory, and time management

items.title: Creative Thinking Exercises: Improve Your Creative Thinking

visible_instructors.title: Tatiana Ambrose
visible_instructors.job_title: Grow your creative thinking, writing & dog business skills
visible_instructors.name: Tatiana

items.headline: Creative exercises to boost your creativity and brainstorm new ideas with design thinking, writing & drawing exercises.
objectives_summary: Develop mental flexibility
Quickly find creative inspiration anywhere you are
Eliminate any creative blocks

items.title: How To Write A Book By Outsourcing: No Writing Book Writing

visible_instructors.title: Alex Genadinik
visible_instructors.job_title: Business, Entrepreneurship, SEO, Marketing, Amazon, YouTube
visible_instructors.name: Alex

items.headline: How to write a book or Kindle ebook: What ebook creation to outsource, how to outsource, plus KDP low content books
objectives_summary: Generate an income from the book
Create a good book even if you don't think of yourself as a good writer
Use book and ebook creation methods used by celebrities who don't actually write their books

items.title: The Essential Poet's Toolbox for Readers and Writers
items.headline: Learn to recognise and appreciate the techniques that lie at the heart of modern English poetry.
objectives_summary: You will gain a deeper understanding of the techniques used in contemporary English-language poetry.
Creative writers will become better equipped to use these techniques effectively in their own writing.
Understanding these tools and techniques will allow poets to judge their own writing more objectively.

items.title: Learn to Grade Comic Books
items.headline: Buy and Sell Your Comic Books with Confidence
objectives_summary: You will be able to grade comics at any grade level, from 0.5 to 10.0
You will learn to identify defects in comics that set them at a specific grade
You will also learn how to take care of your comics to keep them in the best shape possible

items.title: Anybody Can Paint - Shortest Painting Course for Beginners
items.headline: The Shortest & Fastest Introduction to Acrylic Painting for Beginners
objectives_summary: - You will get a quick introduction to acrylic painting
- For beginners who are wanting to get started with painting, this course is ideal
- Introduction to acrylic paints and color mixing

items.title: The Ultimate Screenwriting Course - ALL YOU NEED!
items.headline: In just 30 Days, our screenwriting course will teach you all the tools needed to write your career-changing screenplay
objectives_summary: ALL THE SKILLS YOU NEED TO MASTER THE CRAFT AND WRITE YOUR OWN BEST SCREENPLAY IN 30 DAYS
HOW TO PITCH TO EXECUTIVES
HOW TO FIND AN AGENT

items.title: The Complete Creativity Course: Unleash Your Innovation Now!
items.headline: Turn Your Creative Energies On Daily. You Are the Source of Innovation, Creative Writing and New Ideas
objectives_summary: Creativity
How to build creative habits
Innovation

items.title: Art Therapy for Kids - Building Confidence & Self Expression
items.headline: Art Therapy Techniques Course for Children (PART 1)
objectives_summary: Build & Boost your confidence and self-esteem
Enjoy the benefits of creative art therapy on your emotional and physical wellbeing
Use art to captivate and express how awesome and brilliant you are

items.title: Moon landscape Alcohol Ink
items.headline: Easy Steps to Paint and control Alcohol Inks. Create this Colorful, Beautiful, and Spontaneous painting on Yupo Paper.
objectives_summary: Create a Bold and Beautiful Alcohol Ink Painting of a Night Moon-Scape
Play with Colors and learn tricks to control Alcohol Inks to create details.
Pour and blend colors wet in wet to create smooth backgrounds.

items.title: Screenwriting: Creating the Bulletproof 1 Hour TV Pilot
items.headline: Learn how to craft the professional television pilot from award-winning writer and producer Jeffrey Alan Schechter.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to craft a professionally structured 1 hour pilot script.  In addition, you will have an understanding of the business aspects of television writing so you can make an informed choice exactly what sort of pilot you should write.
